first.name: Voice
first.text: Don't ask me, I don't know either

first.name: Bob
first.text: And I thought you are all-knowing...

first.name: Voice
first.text: Well, I'm just a voice, okay?

next.name: Bob
next.text: Don't forget to wear your mask this time

next.name: Voice
next.text: And I already wash my hand
